name: South Gate
shortDescription: A diverse, urban community in southeast Los Angeles County with parks, shopping, and commuter access.
fullDescription: South Gate offers an urban-suburban mix with active commercial corridors, neighborhood parks, and community centers. Its central location provides convenient access to nearby employment hubs and freeways, while local events and amenities support a tight-knit community feel. Residents enjoy proximity to regional shopping, dining, and public services across southeast LA County.
heroImageAlt: Urban boulevard lined with palm trees and traffic

neighborhoods.description: Urban city with community programs, parks, and convenient access to freeways.

neighborhoods.description: Vibrant city with commercial corridors, neighborhood parks, and community services.

neighborhoods.description: Historic city with cultural institutions, parks, and regional connectivity.

highlights.title: South Gate Park
highlights.description: Expansive community park with sports fields, aquatic center, and recreation programs.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Large park with trees and open fields

highlights.title: Azalea Regional Shopping Center
highlights.description: Modern retail center offering shopping, dining, and everyday services.

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: City-hosted activities, classes, and seasonal celebrations for all ages.

highlights.title: Central Location
highlights.description: Quick access to I-710, I-105, and surrounding southeast LA cities.

faqs.question: What is South Gate known for?
faqs.answer: South Gate is known for South Gate Park, active community programs, and central access to southeast LA County.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in South Gate?
faqs.answer: The market features primarily single-family homes and smaller multifamily properties with competitive pricing for LA County.

faqs.question: What can you do in South Gate?
faqs.answer: Enjoy South Gate Park, shop at Azalea, and explore dining and services along main corridors.

faqs.question: How is commuting from South Gate?
faqs.answer: Proximity to I-710 and I-105 provides convenient routes to employment centers across LA.
